{{Description|One summer day, Klee suddenly receives a letter from the mysterious Dodo-King, threatening to take Dodoco away...?}}
'''Midsummer Island Adventure''' is a [[Flagship Event]] in [[Version 1.6]]. It takes place on a limited time map, the [[Golden Apple Archipelago/1.6|Golden Apple Archipelago]].

==Event Details==
===Event Duration===
*Gameplay Duration: 2021/06/09 11:00 &mdash; 2021/06/28 03:59
*Event Shop Duration: 2021/06/09 11:00 &mdash; 2021/06/29 03:59

===Requirements===
*Adventure Rank 21 or above
*Complete the [[Archon Quest]] "[[Song of the Dragon and Freedom]]" and [[Trifolium Chapter]]: Act I "[[True Treasure]]"
**During the event, the [[Adventure Rank]] required to unlock Klee's Story Quest "True Treasure" will be lowered to Adventure Rank 21, and the Story Quest will not require a Story Key to unlock.

===Event Rules===
During this event, explore the islands, complete various challenges, and collect {{Item|Shiny Flotsam|20}} and {{Item|Mini "Harpastum"|20}} to exchange for rewards such as [[Dodoco Tales]], [[Northlander Billet Trove]], [[Crown of Insight]], and [[Blueprints|Furnishing Blueprints]].
* During the event gameplay duration, enhancing Dodoco Tales (Catalyst) yields a Weapon Enhancement EXP Bonus.

===Event Stages===
Each event stage requires their respective Event Quest to be cleared before it is unlocked.

==Post-Event==
Players who did not raise the [[Golden Apple Archipelago/1.6|Golden Apple Archipelago]] before the end of the event can return to the archipelago before the end of 1.6 to find the archipelago raised. They can also complete the quest [[Summer Gift]] to receive the [[Wind-Blessed Harpastum]] (originally given upon completion of [[Summer Vacation: Proceed With Caution]]).
